definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The senate had a session today with closed doors.
sentences.chinese: 参议院今天召开一次秘密会议。

sentences.english: But Chinese leaders believe such dialogue belongs behind closed doors.
sentences.chinese: 但是中国领导人认为，这种对话属于秘密会晤。

sentences.english: The visitor opened the wrong door and broke in on  a private conference.
sentences.chinese: 那名来访者开错了门，突然扰乱了一个秘密会议。

sentences.english: Free to enter their conclave at will.
sentences.chinese: 随意自由的进入他们的秘密会议。

sentences.english: The committee had an underground meeting and was unanimous to fire him.
sentences.chinese: 委员会召开秘密会议并一致通过解雇他。

sentences.english: Clandestine meetings were held in parking lots and diners.
sentences.chinese: 秘密会议在停车场和餐厅举行。

sentences.english: This non-party attitude is most seen in closed meetings .
sentences.chinese: 这种不分党派的态度，最常见于秘密会议中。

sentences.english: Full details of the secret meeting have emerged in an article in Fortune.
sentences.chinese: 密会的详情已在《财富》的一篇文章中予以披露。

sentences.english: 'Even the term 'huddles' sounds suspicious, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，甚至连“秘密会议”这个词听起来都可疑。

sentences.english: And that he knows when the next super-secret meeting is.
sentences.chinese: 而且他知道下次秘密会议的召开缘由。

sentences.english: There is always an aura of mystery to the conclaves of medical men.
sentences.chinese: 医学界人士的秘密会议总有一种神秘的气氛。

sentences.english: A conclave of cardinals was held to elect the new Pope.
sentences.chinese: 红衣主教团举行了秘密会议来选举新教皇。

definition: to have an affair with sb
to arrange an interview/an appointment (with the foreign ambassador)
to carry on a clandestine love affair
to squeeze in/to step in/to take part/to step between (two persons in a relationship)
to carry on intimately with (idiom); ardent relationship (esp. between lovers)/billing and cooing
to take tea and chat/a small-scale informal gathering with tea and snacks
